imdb.title: Denki-Gai no Honya-san
imdb.plot: A young and shy boy named Umio, started to work for a comic book store. All his other friends already work there, and they get into some new trouble every week.

episodes.title: Rabu & Erosu fô ôru/Naitomea bifoa karunabaru
episodes.plot: Umanohone Store and its characters are introduced. The Ero Hon G Men gives a speech on how she loves erotic books and how everyone loves erotic books. Sensei has to meet a deadline and has a breakdown over it.

episodes.title: Deep Deep Night/Denki machi wa moeteiru ka
episodes.plot: Umanohone has a late night sale that is busy and chaotic, then later on has a summer festival.

episodes.title: Party Hard/Hiotan yo ie uchi ni kaere/Endoresu karunabaru
episodes.plot: Umanohone has a Christmas party, and a New Year's sale.

episodes.title: Kingu obu POP/chocolate panic
episodes.plot: Everyone at the shop gets a shelf where they present manga that they like in order to increase sales, which leads Hiotan on a quest. Later on, a Valentine's Day sale causes pressure, confusion, and nervousness.

episodes.title: Haru ni panchira/I am Rain/Zawameki
episodes.plot: Sensei needs help drawing a pantry shot in her manga and Umio helps her, causing comedy and embarrassment between the two. Later on, everyone enjoys a quiet rainy day at Umanohone.

episodes.title: Yado wa nashi/Secret Paradise
episodes.plot: Sensei has been sleeping at Umanohone (and not changing her clothes) to finish a manga by a deadline, but the staff at Umanohone is willing to help her out.

episodes.title: Iza sentô e.../Mune ga ippai
episodes.plot: Umanohone goes to an hot spring to cool off, then there is a summer fair.

episodes.title: Nemuru hito/I am Rain 2/Rafu sarigenaku
episodes.plot: Sensei is losing sleep. Later on, she accidentally asks Umio on a date but doesn't know how to go about things.

episodes.title: Koijanaino/Yaa, chôshi wa dô dai/Yuki no furu yoru
episodes.plot: Hiotan caught a cold and took the day off from work, so Kantoku comes to her apartment and spends the day with her. Meanwhile, Umanohone has a Christmas sale.

episodes.title: Wandafuru chokorêto/chocolate philosophy/Ameiro no heya/Nemurenu yoru ni tsukamaeta
episodes.plot: On another Valentine's Day, chocolates are made and given away, a mission that is more difficult than it sounds.

episodes.title: Chiisana koro kara/Abakareta seikatsu/Kuchibiru no sore
Inja no shoko/Sakura ga saitara/Welcoming morning
episodes.plot: Everyone at Umanohone goes to a hanami ceremony to view the cherry blossoms.
